name: Recherche de leads aliment√©e par l'IA et g√©n√©ration d'e-mails personnalis√©s avec Groq et Google Sheets
description:
## Description g√©n√©rale et potentiel

**<< Que fait ce flux ? >>**

Dans l'ensemble, ce flux de travail est un **moteur d'automatisation de la prospection commerciale intelligent** qui transforme des leads bruts provenant d'un formulaire ou d'une liste en brouillons d'e-mails d'introduction hautement personnalis√©s et pr√™ts √† √™tre envoy√©s. Le processus commence par la collecte de donn√©es, les enrichit avec une recherche approfondie par IA pour d√©couvrir des "points de douleur", puis utilise ces r√©sultats de recherche pour r√©diger un e-mail pertinent par rapport aux solutions que vous proposez.

Ce syst√®me r√©sout un probl√®me cl√© dans la vente : le manque de temps pour effectuer des recherches approfondies sur chaque lead. En automatisant les √©tapes de recherche et de r√©daction, l'√©quipe de vente peut se concentrer sur des activit√©s √† plus forte valeur ajout√©e, comme l'engagement avec des prospects "chauds" et la gestion des n√©gociations. L'utilisation de Google Sheets comme tableau de bord principal permet √† l'√©quipe de surveiller l'ensemble du processus, de l'entr√©e des leads, de l'√©tat de la recherche et des brouillons d'e-mails, jusqu'au lien d'envoi, le tout dans une interface unique et famili√®re.

**<< Am√©liorations futures potentielles >>**

Ce flux de travail a une base tr√®s solide et peut √™tre d√©velopp√© en un syst√®me encore plus sophistiqu√© :

1.  **Automatisation compl√®te (sans intervention) :** Au lieu de g√©n√©rer un lien √† clic manuel, la sortie de l'Agent IA peut √™tre directement int√©gr√©e dans un n≈ìud **Gmail** ou **Microsoft 365 Email** pour envoyer des e-mails automatiquement. Un n≈ìud `Attendre` pourrait √™tre ajout√© pour cr√©er un d√©lai de quelques minutes ou heures apr√®s la cr√©ation du brouillon, emp√™chant l'envoi instantan√©.

2.  **S√©quences de suivi automatis√©es :** Le flux de travail peut √™tre √©tendu pour g√©rer les e-mails de suivi. En utilisant un webhook pour suivre les ouvertures ou les r√©ponses aux e-mails, vous pourriez construire une logique comme : *"Si l'e-mail d'introduction n'est pas r√©pondu dans les 3 jours, d√©clencher √† nouveau l'Agent IA pour g√©n√©rer l'e-mail de suivi #1 bas√© sur un mod√®le diff√©rent, puis l'envoyer."*

3.  **Notation des leads aliment√©e par l'IA :** Apr√®s l'√©tape de recherche, l'IA pourrait se voir confier la t√¢che suppl√©mentaire de **noter les leads** (par exemple, 1-10 ou Priorit√© √âlev√©e/Moyenne/Basse) en fonction de la mani√®re dont le profil de l'entreprise cible correspond √† votre profil client id√©al (ICP). Cela aide l'√©quipe de vente √† prioriser les leads les plus prometteurs.

4.  **Int√©gration CRM compl√®te :** Au lieu de Google Sheets, le flux de travail pourrait se connecter directement √† **HubSpot, Salesforce ou Pipedrive**. Il tirerait de nouveaux leads du CRM, effectuerait la recherche, r√©digerait l'e-mail et enregistrerait toutes les activit√©s (r√©sultats de recherche, e-mails envoy√©s) dans la chronologie du contact dans le CRM automatiquement.

5.  **Prospection multicanal :** Au-del√† de l'e-mail, l'IA pourrait √™tre instruite pour r√©diger des messages de **demande de connexion LinkedIn** personnalis√©s ou des messages **WhatsApp**. Le flux de travail pourrait alors utiliser les API appropri√©es pour envoyer ces messages, √©largissant votre prospection au-del√† de l'e-mail.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

defaults.name: Lors de l'appui sur ‚ÄòEx√©cuter le flux de travail‚Äô

parameters.toolDescription: Get latest news/description on topic that user want to reseaarch

parameters.text:
=You are an expert business analyst. Your task is to research the company: {{ $json.Perusahaan }}.

Your output must be a comprehensive description that identifies the company's name, its core business, and potential opportunities for improving efficiency and effectiveness by implementing AI solutions.

Use the 'Search Internet' tool to gather the latest information.

Strictly base your analysis on the data found through the internet search. Do not hallucinate or invent information.

Your final output must be only the text description. Do not include any introductory sentences or greetings.

parameters.toolDescription: Get latest news/description on topic that user want to reseaarch

parameters.content:
## Get Leads Data
*   **Data Source:** The workflow starts by fetching lead data from a **Google Sheet**. This sheet is designed to act as a central hub, likely connected to a **Google Form** where new leads are automatically captured. This architecture is highly flexible; the Google Sheet can be easily replaced with other data sources like a **Supabase** database, **Airtable**, or even be pulled directly from your **CRM**.
*   **Smart Filter:** Before being processed further, the workflow performs a crucial check using an `If` node. It verifies if the "Research_Result" column for a lead is empty. This is a key efficiency measure to ensure the workflow **only processes new leads** that haven't been previously analyzed, preventing duplicate work.

## Company Research
*   **Individual Processing:** Each qualified lead is then processed individually using the `Loop Over Items` node, ensuring that every research task and the generated email is focused and specific to a single company at a time.
*   **AI Business Analyst:** The core of this stage is an **AI Agent** (`Company Research1`) assigned the role of an expert business analyst. Its task goes beyond finding general information. Based on a specific *prompt*, the AI is assigned to:
    *   Identify the target company's name and core business model.
    *   Find the latest and most relevant information about the company.
    *   **Analyze and identify opportunities** where your company's AI and automation services can improve efficiency and effectiveness.
*   **Accurate & Current Data:** To avoid hallucinations and ensure relevance, the AI Agent is equipped with a **real-time internet search** tool (using `Tavily`). This allows it to access the latest news, reports, and articles about the target company.
*   **Recording the Results:** The analytical description from the research is automatically inserted back into the Google Sheet under the `Research_Result` column for the corresponding lead. The lead's status is also updated to `Researched`, indicating that the research phase is complete and the lead is ready for email generation.

## Generate & Send Lead Email
*   **Gathering Context:** A second **AI Sales Assistant** ," is activated. This agent gathers various pieces of information to craft the perfect email:
    *   **Lead Data:** The contact's name, position, and company name.
    *   **Research Results:** The in-depth analysis from the previous stage.
    *   **Your Services:** A list of the products/services you offer, fetched from the "List Product" sheet.
    *   **Template & Theme:** The appropriate email template from the "Template" sheet, based on the lead's status (e.g., an "Introduction" email).
*   **Additional Research for a "Hook":** To make the email stand out, the AI performs a **second, more targeted internet search**. The goal is to find a recent statistic or fact (e.g., *"ESG reporting challenges for Indonesian banks in 2025"*) that is highly relevant to the recipient's position, which will be used as a powerful opening line (the hook).
*   **Drafting the Email & CTA:** Using all this context, the AI drafts a complete email‚Äîincluding the *subject* and *body*‚Äîthat is personalized, relevant, and leads to a clear *Call to Action* (CTA). The result is saved in a structured JSON format in the `Draft_Intro_Email` column.
*   **The Send Trigger:** The workflow cleverly creates a **unique URL** in the `Send_Email_Link` column. This URL functions as a manual trigger. When you click this link in Google Sheets, it calls a webhook that can be configured to send the email. This provides a layer of *'human-in-the-loop'* control, allowing the sales team to review the draft before it's sent.

## Overall Description & Potential

**<< What Does This Flow Do? >>**

Overall, this workflow is an **intelligent sales outreach automation engine** that transforms raw leads from a form or a list into highly personalized, ready-to-send introductory email drafts. The process is: it starts by fetching data, enriches it with in-depth AI research to uncover "pain points," and then uses those research findings to craft an email that is relevant to the solutions you offer.

This system solves a key problem in sales: the lack of time to conduct in-depth research on every single lead. By automating the research and drafting stages, the sales team can focus on higher-value activities, like engaging with "warm" prospects and handling negotiations. Using Google Sheets as the main dashboard allows the team to monitor the entire process‚Äîfrom lead entry, research status, and email drafts, all the way to the send link‚Äîall within a single, familiar interface.

**<< Potential Future Enhancements >>**

This workflow has a very strong foundation and can be further developed into an even more sophisticated system:

1.  **Full Automation (Zero-Touch):** Instead of generating a manual-click link, the output from the AI Agent can be directly piped into a **Gmail** or **Microsoft 365 Email** node to send emails automatically. A `Wait` node could be added to create a delay of a few minutes or hours after the draft is created, preventing instant sending.

2.  **Automated Follow-up Sequences:** The workflow can be extended to manage follow-up emails. By using a webhook to track email opens or replies, you could build logic like: *"If the intro email is not replied to within 3 days, trigger the AI Agent again to generate follow-up email #1 based on a different template, and then send it."*

3.  **AI-Powered Lead Scoring:** After the research stage, the AI could be given the additional task of **scoring leads** (e.g., 1-10 or High/Medium/Low Priority) based on how well the target company's profile matches your ideal customer profile (ICP). This helps the sales team prioritize the most promising leads.

4.  **Full CRM Integration:** Instead of Google Sheets, the workflow could connect directly to **HubSpot, Salesforce, or Pipedrive**. It would pull new leads from the CRM, perform the research, draft the email, and log all activities (research results, sent emails) back to the contact's timeline in the CRM automatically.

5.  **Multi-Channel Outreach:** Beyond email, the AI could be instructed to draft personalized **LinkedIn Connection Request** messages or **WhatsApp** messages. The workflow could then use the appropriate APIs to send these messages, expanding your outreach beyond just email.
